rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you just want the Government to make cameras a legal requirement in all childcare settings, or if you also want the Government to change the school starting age.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you want the Government to make cameras a legal requirement in all childcare settings and change the school starting age, the title of your petition would need to make this clear.
